song.title: Pearls (Silent Queen)
song.info:
Lyrics (incomplete): Things were so different Before the clouds went away [???] [???] away
My life was [???] Tied together with [sheltered] dreams Dreams disappear under the silent queen
What [???] Differently Had I known it was a [???] What [???] Differently Had I known it was a [???]
On a drunken slumber Senses [???] [???] [???] slowly fade away
I am a widow now Time is passing oh so slowly [???] [are gone now] [???] silent queen
